vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Sa.11.3; married to Bathsheba (H1339)
Also named: Ourias<\i> (Οὐρίας "Uriah" G3774)
§ Uriah or Urijah = "Jehovah (Yahweh) is my light (flame)"
1) Hittite husband of Bathsheba
2) a priest who built king Ahaz' heathen altar
3) a priest who rebuilt Jerusalem's wall
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hitita; guerrero; esposo de Betsabé; en tiempos de David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
烏利亞 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華是我的亮光 (光芒)"
1) 赫人拔示巴的丈夫 (撒下 11:3)
2) 祭司名, 他為亞哈斯王築了一座異教的壇 (王下 16:10-11)
3) 祭司名, 他重建耶路撒冷的城牆 (尼 8:4)
4) 遭約雅敬王殺害的先知 (耶 26:21,23)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
乌利亚 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华是我的亮光 (光芒)"
1) 赫人拔示巴的丈夫 (撒下 11:3)
2) 祭司名, 他为亚哈斯王筑了一座异教的坛 (王下 16:10-11)
3) 祭司名, 他重建耶路撒冷的城墙 (尼 8:4)
4) 遭约雅敬王杀害的先知 (耶 26:21,23)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at Jer.26.20;
son of: Shemaiah (H8098X)
§ Uriah or Urijah = "Jehovah (Yahweh) is my light (flame)"
a prophet slain by Jehoiakim
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (b)   sacerdote; en tiempos del rey Ahaz; (c)   padre de Meremot, sacerdote, post exílico; (d)   hombre; tribu de Leví; post exílico \hijo de Semaías; falso profeta; en tiempos de Jeremías

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.8.33;
son of: Hakkoz (H6976J);
father of: Meremoth (H4822)
§ Uriah or Urijah = "Jehovah (Yahweh) is my light (flame)"
a prophet slain by Jehoiakim

a prophet slain by Jehoiakim
